title: The Klarkash-Ton Cycle: The Lovecraftian Fiction of Clark Ashton Smith (Chaosium Fiction)
description: Here is a collection of Clark Aston Smith's Cthulhu Mythos fiction, collected and arranged by Robert M. Price, with commentary for each of the stories. Included here are "The Ghoul", "A Rendering from the Arabic", "Ubbo-Sathla", "The Werewolf of Averoigne", and others.
author: Clark Ashton Smith
